verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David בְּ֝בָרְח֗וֹ <WH1272> when he fled מִפְּנֵ֤י ׀ <WH6440> from אַבְשָׁל֬וֹם <WH53> Absalom בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> LORD מָֽה־ <WH4100> how רַבּ֣וּ <WH7231> how are they increased צָרָ֑י <WH6862> that trouble רַ֝בִּ֗ים <WH7227> me many קָמִ֥ים <WH6965> [are] they that rise up עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> against

רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> Many אֹמְרִ֪ים <WH559> [there be] which say לְנַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> of my soul אֵ֤ין <WH369> There יְֽשׁוּעָ֓תָה <WH3444> [There is] no help לּ֬וֹ בֵֽאלֹהִ֬ים <WH430> for him in God סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> But thou O LORD מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> [art] a shield בַּעֲדִ֑י <WH1157> about כְּ֝בוֹדִ֗י <WH3519> for me my glory וּמֵרִ֥ים <WH7311> and the lifter up רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> of mine head

ק֭וֹלִי <WH6963> with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> I cried וַיַּֽעֲנֵ֨נִי <WH6030> and he heard מֵהַ֖ר <WH2022> hill קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <WH6944> me out of his holy סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי <WH7901> I laid me down וָֽאִ֫ישָׁ֥נָה <WH3462> and slept הֱקִיצ֑וֹתִי <WH6974> I awaked כִּ֖י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for the LORD יִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃ <WH5564> sustained

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אִ֭ירָא <WH3372> I will not be afraid מֵרִבְב֥וֹת <WH7233> of ten thousands עָ֑ם <WH5971> of people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> [themselves] against me round about שָׁ֣תוּ <WH7896> that have set עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> against

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <WH6965> Arise יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD הוֹשִׁ֘יעֵ֤נִי <WH3467> save אֱלֹהַ֗י <WH430> me O my God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> for thou hast smitten אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> all mine enemies לֶ֑חִי <WH3895> [upon] the cheek bone שִׁנֵּ֖י <WH8127> the teeth רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the ungodly שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH7665> thou hast broken
לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [belongeth] unto the LORD הַיְשׁוּעָ֑ה <WH3444> Salvation עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> [is] upon thy people בִרְכָתֶ֣ךָ <WH1293> thy blessing סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
